text: The nominations for the 38th annual Razzie Awards have been announced to ` ` honor'' the worst films of the year. Topping this year's list of nominees are Transformers : The Last Knight, the Tom Cruise - starrer The Mummy and the ` ` more - sleep - inducing - than - sexy'' Fifty Shades Darker. Acting nominees include Cruise, Johnny Depp in Pirates of the Caribbean : Dead Men Tell No Tales, Jennifer Lawrence in mother! and Emma Watson in The Circle. This year's nominees were announced the day before the Academy announces its Oscar nominations via a video on the Razzie Awards YouTube channel. The 38th Annual Razzie Awards will take place on Saturday, March 3, the night before the 90th Academy Awards.
